name: The Forge Beginner Guide
Even deeper: Rocks and giant boulders with stronger enemies
description: The complete starter guide for new players. Learn pickaxe progression, race rolling, money making, quests, and everything you need to go from beginner to mid-game!

name: Best Money Making Guide for The Forge
description: The complete guide to earning cash fast in The Forge. Two proven methods that will have you buying pickaxes and gear in no time!

name: All Armor Recipes in The Forge
description: Complete crafting guide for light, medium, and heavy armor sets including exact ore requirements.

name: Best Weapon Recipes in The Forge
description: Complete crafting guide for the strongest weapons including exact ore requirements and multipliers.

name: How to Unlock the Goblin Cave
description: Complete guide to finding the Goblin Village, completing all 5 Goblin King quests, and unlocking the secret Goblin Cave in The Forge.

name: How to Get the Demonic Pickaxe
description: Complete step-by-step guide to unlocking the most powerful pickaxe in The Forge. Master the Volcanic Depths quest, farm Demonite ore, and obtain the legendary Demonite Key!

name: Pickaxe Progression Guide
description: The optimal upgrade path from starter pickaxe to endgame mining power. Learn which pickaxes to buy, which to skip, and how to unlock the secret Arcane Pickaxe!
